doc.previous: King performed at the Mawazine festival in Rabat Morocco on May 27 2010 52 In June 2010 King performed at the Crossroads Guitar Festival with Robert Cray Jimmie Vaughan and Eric Clapton 53 He also contributed to Cyndi Lauper s album Memphis Blues which was released on June 22 2010 54
doc.after: In 2011 King played at the Glastonbury Music Festival 55 and in the Royal Albert Hall in London where he recorded a concert video 56
